body: haitoku there's a manga where the hero removed the mc from the party and the mc girl got stolen by the hero because he has mind control skill called devil eye this is the title:KEIKENCHI CHOCHIKU DE NONBIRI SHOUSHIN RYOKOU if you haven't read this yet
when will this series be translated ?
This isn't really NTR.. mc is just getting his girls back lol
Generic plot like MC get fire from party by leader with whatever reason. This's story who get fire mind control both girl and take them away.
